author: seroze1
content: how does batching transactions save cost for end users, this should help in prioritising the batched transaction over the others but since evm would just consider the gas cost of the whole batch that should be the more or less the same even if it's done individually

author: seroze1
content:
https://medium.com/@tzahi_9751/ethereum-reducing-gas-consumption-with-batch-operations-1339b9cf8bf3

based on this, 

transaction cost = transaction_fee (fixed irrespective of it's a smart contract transaction or normal transaction) + execution_fee 

and by batching we are saving transaction_fee which will be divided by all users,  but the execution_fee would more less be same irrespective of users sending batch vs individual transactions

content:
q) what was the rationale behind having  fixed transaction_fee ?
- avoiding this might have kept the whole  batching of transactions  jazz away
